column1: Paul Dano speaks about #TheBatman “It’s the kind of movie that we’re just desperate to share on the big screen in a big way. So, I hope we all figure this [coronavirus situation] out and get excited to see a Batman movie. It will be worth it. It’s going to be really cool.”
So they found the cure for corona virus.
Judging by his gloves he probably has an underlying health issue meaning he's at high risk of contracting/dying from covid19. I'm in the same boat
